👨‍💻 Experience Graduate Research Assistant @ Deloitte Touches x Commonwealth Cyber Initiatives ▪ Date: 05/2022 - 08/2022. ▪ Location: Arlington, Virginia. ▪ Tech Stack: Python, Tensorflow, Matplotlib, Pandas, Seaborn. Responsibilities ▪ ABC ▪ ABC ▪ Poster. ▪ Presentation. Responsibilities ▪ ABC ▪ ABC Research Assistant @ Geo Lab (William & Mary College) ▪ Date: 09/2020 - 05/2021. ▪ Location: Williamsburg, Virginia. ▪ Tech Stack: Python, Tensorflow, Matplotlib. Responsibilities ▪ ABC ▪ ABC Research Assistant @ Hybrid Electric Vehicle Team (Virginia Tech) ▪ Date: 09/2020 - 05/2021. ▪ Location: Blacksburg, Virginia. ▪ Tech Stack: C++, MATLAB. Responsibilities ▪ ABC ▪ ABC Teaching Assistant @ Integrate System Design (Virginia Tech) ▪ Date: 05/2020 - 05/2021. ▪ Location: Blacksburg, Virginia. ▪ Tech Stack: C++, Circuit Design, Arduino, MIT Mobile App Inventor. Responsibilities ▪ ABC ▪ ABC Research Assistant @ Wireless Lab (Virginia Tech) ▪ Date: 05/2020 - 08/2020. ▪ Location: Blacksburg, Virginia. ▪ Tech Stack: C++, Python. Responsibilities ▪ ABC ▪ ABC 🔧 Skills Languages: Python, SQL, Java, Javascript, HTML, CSS. Web Development Tools: Flask, Vue.js, MySQL, SQLite, Git, Docker, Figma. Data Science Tools: Tensorflow, PyTorch, Scikit-learn, NumPy, Matplotlib, Pandas, Seaborn, Plotly, BeautifulSoup, OpenCV. 🎓 Education Master of Science in Computer Engineering ▪ Concentration: Software & Machine Intelligence. ▪ GPA: 3.82. ▪ Graduation: 05/2024. ▪ Location: Arlington, Virginia. Master of Science in Computer Engineering (Graduated) ▪ Concentration: Machine Learning, Computer Science Minor. ▪ GPA: 3.62. ▪ Graduation: 05/2022. ▪ Location: Blacksburg, Virginia. Relevant Courses ▪ Deep Learning ▪ Web Application Development ▪ Software Engineering ▪ Data Visualization ▪ Advanced Machine Learning ▪ Trustworthy Machine Learning ▪ Data Analytics ▪ Computer Vision ▪ Digital Image Processing ▪ AI & Engineering Applications ▪ Real-time Systems ▪ Data Structure & Algorithms ▪ Principles Of Computer Architecture 📜 Publication "DeepH20: Cyber attack detection in water distribution systems using deep learning." Nazmul Sikder, Minh T. Nguyen, Donald Elliot, Feras Batarseh. Elsevier's Journal of Water Process Engineering (Vol 52.) (04/2023). Link.
💻 Projects Books.JBP image ▪ Developed a single-page full-stack e-commerce web app; followed DAO pattern and SOLID principles. ▪ Tech Stack: Java, Vue.js, MySQL, Figma. ▪ Github. Flask-Y image ▪ Redesigned Y Combinator's Hacker News to be more user-friendly (Reddit style). ▪ Developed a multi-page full-stack media web app that allows multiple users to sign-up, login, and manage/comment/vote posts. ▪ Tech Stack: Python, Javascript, MySQL, Flask API, Werkzeug API, CKEditor API, Bootstrap 5. ▪ Github. Smart Home Simulation ▪ Designed, built, and tested hardware simulation with 8 automated sensors, controlled wirelessly via an Android mobile app. ▪ Appointed to class's teaching assistant by professor due to project's design, presentation, report, and assistance to classmates. ▪ Tech Stack: C++, Circuit Design, Arduino, MIT Mobile App Inventor. ▪ Github. 🙌 Volunteers President @ Teaching Robotics & Engineering Club at Virginia Tech ▪ Taught C/C++, Arduino, and electric foundations and robotics projects for 15-25 club members. ▪ Supervised club Officers in making teaching materials and mentoring club members. Industry Relations Chair @ IEEE Student Branch at Virginia Tech ▪ Tripled the number of participants by hosting peer networking events and info sessions to connect students to faculty-sponsored and company-sponsored opportunities in the ECE department. ▪ Collaborated with company representatives in IEEE@VT Summit, resume review sessions, and tech talks. ▪ Raised a $6,000 annual sponsorship from Collins Aerospace, Lockheed Martin, Boeing, and Texas Instruments. Student Mentor @ Center for Enhancement of Engineering Diversity at Virginia Tech ▪ Served as a sounding board for various issues that confront first-year students during the first 10 weeks. ▪ Held weekly meetings to provide 10 mentees about how to smoothly transition into Virginia Tech culture. Officer @ IEEE Student Branch at Virginia Tech ▪ Organized “Fun Friday’s” peer networking events and the IEEE Summit industry/leadership conference. Math Team Captain @ St. Paul Preparatory School ▪ Won Team Second Place in the 2017 Minnesota High School Mathematics League Tournament. ▪ Assisted the teacher with explaining difficult problems to members. ▪ Assigned math areas to different teammates based on skill sets to boost the team's total score.
